table.name: jo_import_locks
table.sql: CREATE TABLE jo_import_locks (jo_import_lock_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, userid INT NOT NULL, tabid INT NOT NULL, importid INT NOT NULL, locked_since DATETIME) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: jo_import_queue
table.sql: CREATE TABLE jo_import_queue (importid INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, userid INT NOT NULL, tabid INT NOT NULL, field_mapping TEXT, default_values TEXT, merge_type INT, merge_fields TEXT, status INT default 0) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
